Reviews.Title: if your going to buy a phone BUY THIS
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: i got this phone and i didnt think it would be that good but when i got it it was amazing the best phone for a very cheap price compared to others it was exactly as described the phone, clear case, charger, earphones, and everything worked there was no problem it is very fast the 4 inch screen is awesome i strongly advise you to get this if your thinking about it.

Reviews.Title: i love
Reviews.Author: Douglas Garcia
Reviews.Content: hesitate much when buying it for the brand and support here in Venezuela, but it is magnificent as functionality, quality and price. 100% recommended.

Reviews.Title: Amazing and elegant for low price!!
Reviews.Author: christina sarai
Reviews.Content: The measure of this smart cell phone is great, i like too much this style!!The duration of the batery is low if you watch videos or use very much ~  maybe 6 / 8 hours depending of the personal use!!The light of buttons are low but it is okay. The front camera is low and dark, you need strong light for use it. Rear camera is good but not best. the sound is very cool. Screen of 4" with flim protector i think is very great, i enjoy it!The GPS work good and fast with a precision of 15 / 22 meters!! The calls with SIM Card and excelent, i made a test and it have great reception in GMS. Music and videos  play very good is HD and fast!! Games and aplication work very cool. I am using a Micro SD of 8Gb and don't have problems with this. The WiFi work excellent, very fast!!o(^__^ )/ ~ Is a great smartphone with a low price!! ♥ I like so much→ Remember 512 RAM and dual core of 1.3 Ghz.

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.2.2 with 1.3GHz MTK6572W, Cortex A7 Dual-core processor and 512MB RAM + 4GB ROM
Support 2G network: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz; Support 3G network: WCDMA 850/2100MHz
4.0 inch large 2-point-touch capacitive screen with 800 x 480 pixels screen resolution, 260K Colors
5.0M Pixels High definition back camera with flashlight, front 2.0M camera
Built-in GPS navigation with A-GPS assisted, makes the positioning swiftly and accurately
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Cubot GT90 4.0 Inch Screen Android 4.2.2 1.3GHz Cortex A7 Dual core Dual SIM Dual Standby 3G Cell phone Smart phone, Support GPS Wifi Bluetooth (White)
